org.jorlib.frameworks.columnGeneration.master.cutGeneration

Class CutHandler<T extends ModelInterface,W extends MasterData>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jorlib.frameworks.columnGeneration.master.cutGeneration.CutHandler<T,W>

  • public class CutHandler<T extends ModelInterface,W extends MasterData>
extends Object
    The CutHandler is a manager class which maintains various AbstractCutGenerator(s) to generate inequalities of different types.
    Version:
    13-4-2015
    Author:
    Joris Kinable

      • setMasterData

        public void setMasterData(W masterData)
        Supply the data object containing the data from the master problem which is required by the cutGenerators to separate valid inequalities.

        Parameters:
        cutGenerator - cut generator

      • generateInequalities

        public boolean generateInequalities()
        Generates inequalities for the master problem of the column generation model, by invoking the generateInequalities method for each of the registered cut generators. Returns as soon as a single cut has been found!
        Returns:
        true if inequalities have been found

      • addCuts

        public void addCuts(Collection<AbstractInequality> cuts)
        Add a set of inequalities from an external source. Can be used to add a number of initial inequalities which are not separated from the master problem.
        Parameters:
        cuts - Collection of inequalities

      • getCuts

        public List<AbstractInequality> getCuts()
        Gets a list of all inequalities generated by the Cut Generators
        Returns:
        A list of all inequalities generated by the Cut Generators
